main event: A UFO was reported in Southwick, Massachusetts, on 29 September 1959, involving a ground-radar observation.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 12 minutes and involved one object,The object was described as being the size of a basketball and flying at high speed,The object followed a circular pattern,Color slides of a drawing were provided to show the shape of the sighting,No photographs were included in the report.
sighted object: one unidentified object flying at high speed
